name: Multi Technical Machine 01
effect: Attach this card to 1 of your Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Multi Technical Machine 01.
author: “Big Mama” Tagawa

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
